title: Zambos Tostones wrapped with bacon
instructions: Step 1: Place the bacon strips on a tray, put them in the oven and bake at 350°F for 15 minutes.
Step 2: In a bowl, mash the avocados. Add lemon juice and salt to taste. Mix until the guacamole is ready.
Step 3: Place a Zambos Tostón on the bacon strip, spread the tostones with guacamole, place one or two shrimps on top. Finally, roll up the bacon strip.
Step 4: Place a toothpick and an olive to give the final touch to your recipe.
